verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:8
verses.text: And David said unto God, I have sinned greatly, because I have done this thing: but now, I beseech thee, do away the iniquity of thy servant; for I have done very foolishly.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:9
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Gad, David’s seer, saying,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:10
verses.text: Go and tell David, saying, Thus saith the Lord, I offer thee three things: choose thee one of them, that I may do it unto thee.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:11
verses.text: So Gad came to David, and said unto him, Thus saith the Lord, Choose thee
